topic.title: Relaxing hobbies
topic.body: What are some relaxing hobbies that you guys do? I used to do astronomy and watch the space station n stuff but went off it a bit because I don't stay up through the night anymore.

1524903149_173pXRMqj6vLLVMV92FuyxAJWmcD5.body: Whenever it did the round in the press maybe 2015 or 2016..
